prompts: Create a whimsical mushroom Pokemon that glows in the dark and has a cute face.
Show me a fairy-type Pokemon with colorful caps and magical spores floating around it.
Design an adorable Pokemon that resembles a mushroom with a pink umbrella and a playful attitude.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a mushroom-like appearance and a vibrant color scheme.
Generate a small, enchanting Pokemon that uses its spores to create illusions in the forest.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a friendly fungus, exuding charm and a gentle nature.
Give me a unique design of a Pokemon inspired by mushrooms with a fairy-like personality.
